content: click here for free pattern tutorial ** cute bee tutorial 1 ** craft a super cute crochet keychain it s a buzzy bee keychain this pattern is beginner friendly and uses so little yarn you can probably make several with the scrap yarn you have at hand best of all this bee keychain is low sew wow just three stitches for each wing so easy but so adorable so if you re a fan of amigurumi have half an hour to spare or just love all things cute this tutorial is perfect for you don t wait make two and gift one to your best friend or that special someone they will love it join us as we guide you through the entire process of making this cute bee keychain from start to finish with our easy-to-follow instructions you ll have your own little bee keychain in no time whether you re a seasoned crocheter or just starting out you ll find this project both enjoyable and rewarding you will need * yarn in yellow black and white * 5mm or 6mm eyes or black yarn to sew on eyes and nose * key ring * crochet hook * yarn needle * stitch marker * small amount of stuffing for your bee keychain to be the same size as mine please use any type of yarn that will fit well on a size 4 2 5mm or size 5 3mm hook in this free tutorial you ll learn * the materials you ll need to get started * step-by-step crochet instructions with detailed visuals * some tips and tricks to make a smashing crochet keychain ✨ why you ll love this free tutorial * clear easy-to-follow instructions * high-quality close-up visuals to guide you through each step * a fun and rewarding project that makes a great gift or keepsake 1 https //youtu be/tgttxdides4
